接口的使用
javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionContext

  • 使用HttpSessionContext的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    javax.servlet.http
    The javax.servlet.http package contains a number of classes and interfaces that describe and define the contracts between a servlet class running under the HTTP protocol and the runtime environment provided for an instance of such a class by a conforming servlet container.
    org.apache.catalina.session
    This package contains the standard Manager and Session implementations that represent the collection of active sessions and the individual sessions themselves, respectively, that are associated with a Context.

    • javax.servlet.http中HttpSessionContext的使用

      返回HttpSessionContext的javax.servlet.http中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      HttpSessionContext HttpSession.getSessionContext()
      已过时。 
      As of Version 2.1, this method is deprecated and has no replacement. It will be removed in a future version of the Java Servlet API.

    • org.apache.catalina.session中HttpSessionContext的使用

      声明为HttpSessionContext的org.apache.catalina.session中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected static HttpSessionContext StandardSession.sessionContext
      已过时。 
      返回HttpSessionContext的org.apache.catalina.session中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      HttpSessionContext StandardSessionFacade.getSessionContext()
      已过时。 
      As of Version 2.1, this method is deprecated and has no replacement.
      HttpSessionContext StandardSession.getSessionContext()
      已过时。 
      As of Version 2.1, this method is deprecated and has no replacement. It will be removed in a future version of the Java Servlet API.
